topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ae04526368723edb750700#post_54ae04526368723edb750700
We always give Shinji a hard time and poke fun at him but lets be real, His life is fucking terrible!

[spoiler]Everyone he knows and love treats him like shit or dies, Then they force him to muster up the Balls/confidents to PILOT A FUCKING DEMON MACHINE AND FIGHT GIANT PLANET MURDERING ANGELS, His dad does NOTHING to help him through these problems, His friends do nothing! The one guy who actually cared turns out to be an Angel or something and he dies![/spoiler]

What the fuck man!

While Asuka was a great character, She's easily one of the biggest assholes of them all so far. (Besides Gendo)

[spoiler]Don't get me wrong though, I understand why she's like that, Doesn't make it better though.[/spoiler]

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ae03e963687230347d0200#post_54ae03e963687230347d0200
I don't mean during the events of evangelion, but beforehand; what I mean by this is that if Shinji was screwed up from the events during the show I could understand.  Gendo may have been a fucked up parent, but *before* the events of evangelion the main thing Gendo did was abandon his kid.  Shinji seemed less like his dad screwed him up and more like Shinji already had mental problems before the events of evangelion.

Tl:dr; Shinji probably had mental problems before he became a pilot.

Edit: I think that's definetly enough to give someone some serious mental problems.
